name: ele.scratch
descr: Set or get scratchpad data, where temporary or non-JSON data can be stored.  App-level scratchpad data should use namespaces prefixed with underscore, like `'_foo'`.

formats.descr: Get the entire scratchpad object for the element.
Get the scratchpad at a particular namespace.
Set the scratchpad at a particular namespace.

args.name: value
args.descr: The value to set at the specified namespace.
